Interface uci.graph.MutableGraphModel

  Summary 

public interface  MutableGraphModel
     extends uci.graph.GraphModel
{
          // Methods 10
     public abstract void addEdge(Object);
     public abstract void addNode(Object);
     public abstract boolean canAddEdge(Object);
     public abstract boolean canAddNode(Object);
     public abstract boolean canConnect(Object, Object);
     public abstract boolean canConnect(Object, Object, Class);
     public abstract Object connect(Object, Object);
     public abstract Object connect(Object, Object, Class);
     public abstract void removeEdge(Object);
     public abstract void removeNode(Object);
}

This interface provides a facade to a net-level representation. Similiar in concept to the Swing class TreeModel.

This interface goes beyond GraphModel in that it allows modifications to the graph, instead of just access.

See Also: DefaultGraphModel, AdjacencyMatrixGraphModel, uci.graph.demo.WordTransforms
